description: In a macabre setting resembling a dungeon, a masked figure points towards a man stretched on a rack, presenting it to an elderly couple as if giving a casual demonstration. The scene is populated by other figures also appearing confined, including a man chained to a ball. The surreal juxtaposition of a horrific torture device being showcased as a normal exhibit for tourists highlights the absurd and darkly ironic nature of the situation.
caption:
"Now over here, Mom and Dad, is what we call 
'The Rack,' and I'll show you how it works."
